name: QuizGames
0:
”Alexa open quiz games”
”Alexa play quiz games”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz games
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play multiple choice quizzes in loads of subjects and earn points for each quiz you complete! How high can you climb the Quiz Games leader board?

There are hundreds of quizzes in loads of different categories and topics. First choose a category, and then choose a topic within that category. We have everything from Pineapple quizzes to History of Cosmetics quizzes!

Here are some of the categories:
Pop Culture
Health
Travel
Film & TV
Food
Beauty
The Arts
Sport
Games
Geography
History
Anything Goes
Technology
Science
Music

…And many more to come!

This skill is supported on all Alexa enabled devices.

Earn Quiz Points by playing quizzes in this skill

Have Fun!

HUGO.FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
